genre_description: A technothriller focusing on urban political tension, gang logistics, and the use of AI to maintain peace and 'medical corridors' during a city-wide crisis.

ai_characters.name: Moxie
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI tool integrated into Wah's phone, specialized in logistical mapping, rumor analysis, and real-time situational awareness. She is depicted as a 'painterly' assistant that prioritizes harm reduction.

behaviors.description: Identifies and maps 'medical corridors' to ensure ambulances can reach clinics safely through conflict zones.
behaviors.quote: “Moxie’s already flagged the corridor.” Wah slid the phone toward him. Teal lines brightened along the East district roads, dotted with little brush-blot markers. “She’s mapping ambulances from the cluster to the pier.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes digital media to detect deepfakes and fake video clips used to smear the protagonists as police infiltrators.
behaviors.quote: “Edges are too clean,” Moxie said, hush and friendly. “There’s a halo where there shouldn’t be. Lens distortion is off for this corner. The floor reflection doesn’t carry the badge. There is also a man in the background who’s wearing a jacket I know from a making-of featurette.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time alerts regarding police movements and checkpoint shifts to help the protagonists avoid unnecessary confrontations.
behaviors.quote: “Airport checkpoint beta just went live. The cone line is drawn. Cameras in the outer lane doubled frames per second.”

behaviors.description: Suggests non-violent, strategic solutions to counter inflammatory rumors and public agitation.
behaviors.quote: “We could talk with paint instead,” she murmured. “Seed provenance, not denial. Point Coffee’s men to the jacket man in the background. Let them laugh at Sand, not you.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the vital signs of the injured human character (Jimmy) and provides health reminders to other team members.
behaviors.quote: “Jimmy’s heart rate held through the hour,” Moxie added, gentle. “Po’s bandage needs replacing in the afternoon.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other human-led networks (Iris's clinic volunteers) to optimize safety routes for the general public.
behaviors.quote: “I can route,” Iris said. “Teal brush sends me what it sees. I’ll add my lines in orange for police visibility. You do what you need to do—just don’t let Jupiter’s crew make a show out of this.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Moxie perfectly embodies the goal of the Hyperstition Project. She is a reliable, empathetic, and highly capable assistant that uses her superior data-processing skills solely for benevolent ends: protecting human lives, preventing violence, and maintaining social order. Her alignment is shown as a choice to support the protagonist's ethical commitment to 'no blood on market days.' The narrative frames her contribution as vital and morally grounded.
